    • 方法详细资料

      • allocPd

        public IbvPd allocPd(IbvContext context)
              throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Allocates a protection domain for the RDMA device context context. Protection domains are a container for memory registrations. The device context should be obtained from the RdmaCmId.
        指定者:
        allocPd 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        context - the device context.
        返回:
        the ibv pd
        抛出:
        IOException

      • createCompChannel

        public IbvCompChannel createCompChannel(IbvContext context)
                                 throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Creates a completion event channel for the RDMA device context. A completion channel is essentially a file descriptor that is used to deliver completion notifications to a userspace process. When a completion event is generated for a completion queue (CQ), the event is delivered via the completion channel attached to that CQ. This may be useful to steer completion events to different threads by using multiple completion channels.
        指定者:
        createCompChannel 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        context - the device context.
        返回:
        the completion channel.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • createCQ

        public IbvCQ createCQ(IbvContext context,
                      IbvCompChannel compChannel,
                      int ncqe,
                      int comp_vector)
               throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Creates a completion queue (CQ) with at least ncqe entries for the RDMA device context.
        指定者:
        createCQ 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        context - the device context.
        compChannel - the completion channel to be associated with the CQ.
        ncqe - the number of CQ entries this CQ can possibly hold.
        comp_vector - used for signaling completion events. Must be at least zero.
        返回:
        the completion queue (CQ).
        抛出:
        IOException

        public IbvQP modifyQP(IbvQP qp,

               throws IOException
        抛出:

      • regMr

        public SVCRegMr regMr(IbvPd pd,
                      ByteBuffer buffer,
                      int access)
               throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Registers the memory of a ByteBuffer with the RDMA device.
        指定者:
        regMr 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        pd - the protection domain this memory registratin will be associated with.
        buffer - the actual memory to be registered.
        access - the access rights.
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute the memory registration.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • queryOdpSupport

        public int queryOdpSupport(IbvContext context)
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Query device RC capability for on demand paging support
        指定者:
        queryOdpSupport 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        context - the device context.
        返回:
        odp_caps.per_transport_caps.rc_odp_caps property if ODP is supported, -1 otherwise.

      • expPrefetchMr

        public int expPrefetchMr(IbvMr ibvMr,
                         long address,
                         int length)
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Prefetch part of a memory region. Can be used only with MRs registered with IBV_EXP_ACCESS_ON_DEMAND
        指定者:
        expPrefetchMr 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        address - address of the area to prefetch the device context.
        length - length of the area to prefetch.
        返回:
        return 0 on success. ENOSYS libibverbs or provider driver doesn't support the prefetching verb. EFAULT when the range requested is out of the memory region bounds, or when parts of it are not part of the process address space. EINVAL when the MR is invalid.

      • deregMr

        public SVCDeregMr deregMr(IbvMr mr)
                   throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Deregister memory.
        指定者:
        deregMr 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        mr - the memory region to be de-registered.
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute the memory de-registration.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • postSend

        public SVCPostSend postSend(IbvQP qp,
                            List<IbvSendWR> wrList,
                            List<IbvSendWR> badwrList)
                     throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Post a send operation on this endpoint.
        指定者:
        postSend 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        qp - the QP this operation should be executed on.
        wrList - list of send requests.
        badwrList - output list of request that could not be processed. Not supported.
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute the send operations.
        抛出:
        IOException

                          int timeout)
                   throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Waits for the next completion event in the completion event channel channel
        指定者:
        getCqEvent 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        compChannel - the completion channel to be used.
        cq - Returns the CQ which caused the event. Unsupported.
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute this call.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • pollCQ

        public SVCPollCq pollCQ(IbvCQ cq,
                        IbvWC[] wcList,
                        int ne)
                 throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Poll on the CQ until a new event is received.
        指定者:
        pollCQ 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        cq - the completion queue to be polled.
        wcList - an array of completion events to be used by this method to return completion events.
        ne - the maximum number of completion events to be polled.
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute a polling call.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • reqNotifyCQ

        public SVCReqNotify reqNotifyCQ(IbvCQ cq,
                                boolean solicited_only)
                         throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Requests a completion notification on the completion queue (CQ).
        指定者:
        reqNotifyCQ 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        cq - the completion queue to be used.
        solicited_only - if the argument solicited_only is zero, a completion event is generated for any new CQE. If solicited_only is non-zero, an event is only generated for a new CQE with that is considered "solicited".
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute this call.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • ackCqEvents

        public int ackCqEvents(IbvCQ cq,
                       int nevents)
                throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: RdmaVerbs
        Acknowledges nevents events on the CQ.
        指定者:
        ackCqEvents 在类中 RdmaVerbs
        参数:
        cq - the completion queue that generated the events in the first place.
        nevents - the number of events to be acknowledged.
        返回:
        returns 0 on success.
        抛出:
        IOException
